Sentencas: Direct internal reforming is one of the promising methods of utilizing hydrocarbon fuels in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane

Sentencas: Among direct internal reforming technologies, dry reforming of methane (DRM) is attracting attention as an alternative to steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane

Sentencas: In this study, a cermet material composed of nickel and samarium-doped ceria (Ni-SDC) was investigated as an SOFC anode for the direct internal DRM operation.
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane

Sentencas: Compared to a conventional nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anode, the Ni-SDC anode showed superior current-voltage characteristics.
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane

Sentencas: However, poor carbon balances were recorded in anode outlet gas analysis, indicating coke formation on the Ni-SDC anode.
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane

Sentencas: The addition of calcium to the Ni-SDC anode was also tested.
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane

Sentencas: Measured anode outlet gas compositions suggested that the calcium addition suppressed coke formation, while the power generation performance of the pristine Ni-SDC anode was maintained.
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane

Sentencas: Microscopic observations showed that a certain part of the calcium additive existed as CaO particles on the anode surface, which could be responsible for the improved coking resistance.
Titulo: Calcium-Modified Ni-SDC Anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for Direct Dry Reforming of Methane
